scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix front-end && npm install --prefix back-end && npm run create-env
scripts.build: concurrently "mkdir -p build/fe && mkdir -p build/be " "npm run build:front-end --verbose" "npm run build:back-end"
scripts.build:front-end: npm run build --prefix front-end && rm -rf build/fe/static && mv front-end/fe-build/* build/fe/ && rm -rf front-end/fe-build
scripts.build:back-end: npm run build --prefix back-end && rm -rf build/be/src && mv back-end/back-end/* build/be/ && cp back-end/back-end/.env build/be/ && rm -rf back-end/back-end
